content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Application_ApplicationInventory_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize InstallCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Install Count Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Application_ApplicationInventory_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize Installs = count() by Publisher_s
| where isnotempty(Publisher_s)
| top 10 by Installs
| project Publisher = Publisher_s, Installs
content.title: Top Installed Application Publishers

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");

uberAgent_Application_ApplicationInventory_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, DisplayName_s, DisplayVersion_s, InstallDate_s, InstallLocation_s, Publisher_s, IsMachineInstall_b, IsMsiPackage_b, Language_s
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Application Inventory

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_Application_ApplicationInventory_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AppCount = dcount(DisplayName_s) by Computer
| top 10 by AppCount desc
content.title: Top Machines by App Count

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_Application_ApplicationInventory_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize Count = count() by Language = coalesce(Language_s, "Unknown")
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Language Distribution of Apps
Installed and Launched Apps
